findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations could leave parties vulnerable to claims or damages arising from breaches or third-party actions.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of audit rights may limit the ability of the Receiving Party to verify compliance with the confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The three-year term may not provide sufficient protection for long-term confidential information, especially if the information remains sensitive beyond the term.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
